description: Login ID of the employee/labor resource whose craft/trade rate this record defines; used to link rates to individuals. Likely the system username; confirm with SME.
Original line number from the source file or batch load, used for ordering and error tracking during imports; confirm with SME.
Code representing the maintenance craft/trade (e.g., mechanic, welder) associated with the labor resource.
Hourly labor rate for the specified craft, in the organizationâ€™s standard currency; used for costing and billing.
Free-text notes or comments about the rate entry, such as justification, source, or effective context.
User who created the record, for audit trail.
Timestamp when the record was created (system time), for audit trail and effective dating.
User who last modified the record, for audit trail.
Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Sequence identifier to order or group multiple rate rows within a batch or per user; likely used with imports; confirm with SME.
